review: I have stayed in Hotel Good times in Nov. 2018 with my family.I have with also my small 2 babies. So, Hotel owner Mr. Rakesh Sridhar have provided us every thing that we needed. Really I feel here like as my home... Thankx
name: Tarun Sharma

review: Everything about this hotel is good. Location food, room service quality of food. It is located close to city attractions like maeket, restaurants, bustatnd and railway station. For the price they charge the hotel is recommended for short business stays.
name: Sureka S

review: This is a small but good hotel with just about basic amenities for a simple non fussy economical stay. Pricing ia dwcent and all basic amenities are close by. Staff is very courteous. If convenience and price is anything to go by thia hotel ia great.
name: Alok S

review: The Hotel is situated at a very convenient location and therefore ideally suited for the less fuss traveller. In addtion the rooms are clean and comfortable and the service very good. All in all a good budget hotel at a very good price.
name: Sureka S

review: if I'll plan to go rudrapur only a hotel in my mind Hotel good time it's near by Railway Stations, Staff was very helpful. hotel manager was very excellent you didn't realized you're in other city it's very humble and anything do.
name: Deepak R

review: The location of the hotel always pleases me. Other than that its good service , neat and clean rooms and decent food quality makes one feel at home. Staying at this hotel never gives you a dull moment.
name: Alok S

review: thank you hotel good times, rally the hotel is nice and they provides great hospitality, the staff was good, my overall experience is great and i recommended it to all travelers this is safe for couples. i went there with my Girlfriend and we did lots of masti!!!! So, Its a safe place for couples also.. Staff and Manager was good.
name: saurabh t

review: I go to Rudrapur on work quite frequently and this is one place which is as good as any. For the price and its proximity to the main market and city this is a very good hotel offering good , clean rooms and good service.  Overall a good place for short stays.
name: Alok S

review: Hotel Good Times is a good Budget Hotel in Rudrapur. I also visited Ginger Hotels in Pantnagar - Rudrapur but except bathroom ( better is Ginger ) it's almost same. Hotel Good Times Located just outside the Rudrapur City Railway Station which is quite good for persons who will reach late night by train. Except these quality of Restaurant is also good with availability of Veg & Non-Veg food both.
name: Pranay_Jani

review: Had a late night check-in at the hotel, as it is the nearest to the railway station and we wanted to avoid going to the city in extreme winter conditions. The surroundings are scarcely habituated with large open spaces. The hotel room was not spacious but was comfortable enough for an overnight stay for a business traveller. The service was very prompt and the food was good. The attached bathroom had 24-hour hot-water facility, which had to be verified due to lack of evidence found. Even though we took two blankets each & the room was visibly sealed, the chill made its presence felt all through the night.  Overall, a less than a ideal comfortable stay, but good enough for a short one.
name: AdityaK

review: When I joined a company ITW Signode I stayed in this hotel almost 10 days and really impressed by the warm and friendly welcome by hotel manager  and by owner itself even they helped me in  search of residential accomodation in the suitable location, They were doing services by heart for the pleasure of customer and respecting peoples values ....., I want give my heartiest appreciation to Mr. Naresh Sridhar ( Ownner ) , Mr. Subhash ( Manager ) and to lalit, manoj other staff .....!!  Rakesh Dubey HR Head ( Paper & Plastics ) Manufacturing Rudrapur and Daman location ITW-India Ltd.
name: 173sgrr
userloc: Dadra, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India

review: i was in Rudrapur in Jan 2012, it was freezing cold out there.  About Hotel: Room was good, Hot and Cold water in bathroom. food they served was very tasty (but will increase your bill ;)  Only thing what i didn't like was location. no market, no restaurant nothing. and if you want to go somewhere its hard to find rickshaw or auto, although the hotel is in front of Railway Station.
name: rks1985

review: good hotel came second time, good helpful staff, manager courteous and ready to help. peaceful and good location.good cosy small rooms. neat and clean. happy to stay with them.rest all was good. even the was good and homely.waiters are always happy to help types,
name: sanjev

review: Good comfortable hotel to stay with It is the perceptive and friendly service that makes it worthwhile staying in this small family-run hotel. The owners and staff are social at just the right level and they go to great length to make you feel at home. In the afternoon, the staff would bring out snacks and coffee for guests who had opted to spend the day in the shade of the palm trees in the little garden. At no charge.
name: sanjev
